variable.name: total_mean_wage
variable.description: Average wage paid by a firm

variable.name: production_costs
variable.description: Actual production costs, labor and capital

variable.name: total_mean_wage
variable.description: Average wage paid by a firm

variable.name: production_costs
variable.description: Actual production costs, labor and capital

variable.name: production_costs
variable.description: Actual production costs, labor and capital

variable.name: payment_account_balance_sheet
variable.description: Payment account when calculating balance sheet.

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: gov_id
Variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: day_of_month_to_act
Variable.description: Activation day.

Variable.name: last_day_of_month_to_act
Variable.description: One day before the activation day.

Variable.name: payment_account
Variable.description: Current account value.

Variable.name: payment_account_balance_sheet
Variable.description: Payment account when calculating balance sheet.

Variable.name: bank_id
Variable.description: Bank ID at which the agent maintains its payment account.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: cpi
Variable.description: This is the CPI in firm memory, used in the evaluation of the inventory stock.

Variable.name: mean_wage
Variable.description: Average production wage paid by a firm

Variable.name: total_mean_wage
Variable.description: Average wage paid by a firm

Variable.name: mean_wage_r_and_d
Variable.description: Average wage paid by a firm

Variable.name: needed_capital_stock
Variable.description: The overall capital stock a firm wants to have

Variable.name: stock
Variable.description: Current Stock on the day of month to act

Variable.name: critical_stock
Variable.description: Current Critical Stock on the day of month to act

Variable.name: actual_cap_price
Variable.description: Price of the latest capital good

Variable.name: mean_specific_skills
Variable.description: Average specific skills of the workforce

Variable.name: planned_production_quantity
Variable.description: Planned production quantity, has a value on production day, but is reset on other days.

Variable.name: production_quantity
Variable.description: Actual production quantity, has a value on production day, but is reset on other days.

Variable.name: planned_output
Variable.description: Planned output is the same as planned production quantity, but retains its value during the month.

Variable.name: output
Variable.description: Actual output is the same as production quantity, but retains its value during the month.

Variable.name: unit_costs
Variable.description: Cost per unit of the consumption good

Variable.name: total_supply
Variable.description: The sum of local inventory and produced output gives the total supplied quantity

Variable.name: production_costs
Variable.description: Actual production costs, labor and capital

Variable.name: total_buffer
Variable.description: Total buffer: q - Quantile of the normal distribution * standard deviation

Variable.name: revenue_per_day
Variable.description: Daily revenue

Variable.name: technological_frontier
Variable.description: Best available technology in the economy

Variable.name: vintage_selected
Variable.description: technology choice

Variable.name: initial_technology
Variable.description: Initial productivity of the capital stock.

Variable.name: utilization_capacity
Variable.description: degree of utilization of the capital stock

Variable.name: cum_revenue
Variable.description: Monthly revenue

Variable.name: quality
Variable.description: Quality of the consumption good

Variable.name: price
Variable.description: Price of the consumption good

Variable.name: price_last_month
Variable.description: Price of the consumption good in the last month

Variable.name: actual_mark_up
Variable.description: Mark up on unit costs

Variable.name: demand_capital_stock
Variable.description: Demand for capital goods

Variable.name: effective_investments
Variable.description: Capital investments as units times productivity

Variable.name: effective_capital_stock
Variable.description: Capital stock as units times productivity

Variable.name: planned_production_costs
Variable.description: Planned production costs

Variable.name: labour_costs_production
Variable.description: Planned production costs

Variable.name: labour_costs_innovation
Variable.description: Planned production costs

Variable.name: intermediate_quality_level_developing
Variable.description: Intermediate level during innovation process

Variable.name: adaption_production_volume_due_to_insufficient_finances
Variable.description: Percentage of production by which the quantity is reduced

Variable.name: total_sold_quantity
Variable.description: Daily sum of sold quantities in all malls. The sold quantity of one firm in all malls.

Variable.name: cum_total_sold_quantity
Variable.description: Monthly sum of sold quantities in all malls. The monthly sold quantity of one firm in all malls.

Variable.name: sold_quantity_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Monthly sum of sold quantities in all malls. The quantity sold in one calendar month.

Variable.name: total_external_financing_obtained
Variable.description: Financing raised from external sources

Variable.name: capital_costs
Variable.description: Money spent for capital investments in the current month

Variable.name: labour_costs
Variable.description: Total wage bill

Variable.name: vintage_choice_taken
Variable.description: Indicator variable if firm did vintage choice in the current production cycle

Variable.name: financial_resources_for_production
Variable.description: Money available for production

Variable.name: total_units_local_inventory
Variable.description: Units of local inventories held in the malls

Variable.name: calc_capital_costs
Variable.description: Calculative capital costs

Variable.name: calc_production_costs
Variable.description: Calculative production costs

Variable.name: firm_productivity
Variable.description: min of technology and mean_specific_skills

Variable.name: total_productivity_capital_stock
Variable.description: Total productivity of the capital stock

Variable.name: firm_productivity_last_year
Variable.description: Level of firm's productivity 12 month ago

Variable.name: firm_productivity_progress
Variable.description: Change in firm's productivity

Variable.name: number_of_banks_asked
Variable.description: Number of banks where the firm has asked for loans.

Variable.name: received_interest_daily
Variable.description: Received daily interest on bank account.

Variable.name: received_interest_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Sum of all interest on bank account received in calendar month

Variable.name: flag_illiquidity_correction
Variable.description: correction in cas illiquidity: debt rescaling uses TotalDebt, not TotalAssets

Variable.name: ebit
Variable.description: Earnings-before-interest-and-taxes: total revenue - sales_costs

Variable.name: earnings
Variable.description: Earnings after interest payments (= ebit - interest)

Variable.name: tax_rate_corporate
Variable.description: Tax rate on corporate profits (kept in memory)

Variable.name: tax_rate_vat
Variable.description: VAT tax rate

Variable.name: tax_payment
Variable.description: Tax payment over earnings after interest payments (tax_corporate*earnings)

Variable.name: tax_payment_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Tax payment over earnings after interest payments (tax_corporate*earnings)

Variable.name: net_earnings
Variable.description: Net earnings after tax payments (= ebit - interest - tax)

Variable.name: previous_net_earnings
Variable.description: Net earnings from previous production period

Variable.name: total_interest_payment
Variable.description: Total interest payments on outstanding debts

Variable.name: total_interest_payment_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Total interest payments on outstanding debts in calendar month

Variable.name: total_debt_installment_payment
Variable.description: Total debt installment payments on outstanding debts

Variable.name: total_debt_installment_payment_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Total debt installment payments on outstanding debts incalendar month

Variable.name: total_dividend_payment
Variable.description: Total dividend payment

Variable.name: total_dividend_payment_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Total dividend payment in calendar month

Variable.name: flag_full_dividend
Variable.description: Indicator is 1 if 100 percent dividend payout.

Variable.name: current_share_price
Variable.description: Current share price on the market

Variable.name: previous_dividend_per_share
Variable.description: Dividend-per-share ratio (previous production cycle)

Variable.name: current_dividend_per_share
Variable.description: Dividend-per-share ratio

Variable.name: previous_earnings_per_share
Variable.description: Earnings-per-Share ratio (previous production cycle)

Variable.name: current_earnings_per_share
Variable.description: Earnings-per-Share ratio

Variable.name: previous_dividend_per_earnings
Variable.description: Dividend-to-Earnings ratio (previous production cycle)

Variable.name: current_dividend_per_earnings
Variable.description: Dividend-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: debt_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Debt-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: debt_equity_ratio
Variable.description: Debt-to-Equity ratio

Variable.name: price_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Price-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: retained_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Retained earnings-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: earnings_per_share_ratio_growth
Variable.description: Target growth of the Earnings-per-Share ratio

Variable.name: critical_price_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Critical (target) value for the Price-Earnings ratio (can be set by the firm)

Variable.name: critical_earnings_per_share_ratio
Variable.description: Critical (target) value for the Earnings-per-Share ratio (derived from the growth level)

Variable.name: total_debt
Variable.description: Total value of all loans outstanding

Variable.name: target_debt
Variable.description: Target value for total debt in bankruptcy debt rescaling procedure.

Variable.name: total_debt_balance_sheet
Variable.description: Total value of all loans outstanding

Variable.name: total_value_local_inventory
Variable.description: Total value of all local inventory stocks held at malls

Variable.name: total_value_local_inventory_balance_sheet
Variable.description: Total value of all local inventory stocks held at malls

Variable.name: total_units_capital_stock
Variable.description: Units of capital stock

Variable.name: total_value_capital_stock
Variable.description: Value of the capital stock

Variable.name: total_value_capital_stock_balance_sheet
Variable.description: Value of the capital stock

Variable.name: total_capital_depreciation_value
Variable.description: Sum over all units of capital of the depreciation value

Variable.name: total_capital_depreciation_units
Variable.description: Sum over all units of capital of the depreciation in units

Variable.name: total_assets
Variable.description: Value of total assets

Variable.name: equity
Variable.description: equity = total assets - total liabilities

Variable.name: equity_balance_sheet
Variable.description: equity = total assets - total liabilities

Variable.name: production_liquidity_needs
Variable.description: Production liquidity needs are production costs (labour costs and investments)

Variable.name: financial_liquidity_needs
Variable.description: Financial liquidity needs are prior financial commitments (interests, installments, taxes)

Variable.name: total_financial_needs
Variable.description: Total financial needs = Production liquidity needs + Financial liquidity needs + dividends

Variable.name: external_financial_needs
Variable.description: External financing

Variable.name: earnings_per_share
Variable.description: Earnings per share ratio

Variable.name: retained_earnings
Variable.description: Retained earnings = net earnings - dividend payout

Variable.name: total_payments
Variable.description: Sum of payments: taxes, interest, principle, production costs (labour+capital).

Variable.name: previous_shares_outstanding
Variable.description: Outstanding shares in previous month

Variable.name: minsky_state
Variable.description: Minsky state for firms. values 1-4.

Variable.name: minsky_state_1
Variable.description: Minsky firm category 1: Non-borrowers, do not need credit to produce.

Variable.name: minsky_state_2
Variable.description: Minsky firm category 2: Hedge borrowers, need credit to produce.

Variable.name: minsky_state_3
Variable.description: Minsky firm category 3: Speculative borrowers, need credit to pay principle only (debt installment).

Variable.name: minsky_state_4
Variable.description: Minsky firm category 4: Ponzi borrowers, need credit to pay interest and principle (debt installment).

Variable.name: minsky_state_5
Variable.description: Minsky firm category 5: other, non-classified.

Variable.name: minsky_state_20
Variable.description: Hedge borrowers, no financial difficulties.

Variable.name: minsky_state_21
Variable.description: Hedge borrower, who entered in financial crisis.

Variable.name: minsky_state_22
Variable.description: Hedge borrower, who entered illiquidity bankruptcy.

Variable.name: minsky_state_23
Variable.description: Hedge borrower, who entered insolvency bankruptcy.

Variable.name: minsky_state_30
Variable.description: Speculative borrowers, no financial difficulties.

Variable.name: minsky_state_31
Variable.description: Speculative borrower, who entered in financial crisis.

Variable.name: minsky_state_32
Variable.description: Speculative borrower, who entered illiquidity bankruptcy.

Variable.name: minsky_state_33
Variable.description: Speculative borrower, who entered insolvency bankruptcy.

Variable.name: minsky_state_40
Variable.description: Ponzi borrowers, no financial difficulties.

Variable.name: minsky_state_41
Variable.description: Ponzi borrower, who entered in financial crisis.

Variable.name: minsky_state_42
Variable.description: Ponzi borrower, who entered illiquidity bankruptcy.

Variable.name: minsky_state_43
Variable.description: Ponzi borrower, who entered insolvency bankruptcy.

Variable.name: age_at_bankruptcy
Variable.description: Age of the firm when it goes bankrupt.

Variable.name: debt_at_bankruptcy
Variable.description: Debt of the firm when it goes bankrupt.

Variable.name: equity_at_bankruptcy
Variable.description: Equity of the firm when it goes bankrupt.

Variable.name: no_employees_at_bankruptcy
Variable.description: Number of employees of the firm when it goes bankrupt.

Variable.name: equity_asset_ratio
Variable.description: Equity/Total assets. This is an indicator of financial failure.

Variable.name: profit_asset_ratio
Variable.description: Profit: net earnings/total assets.

Variable.name: sales_asset_ratio
Variable.description: Sales: Earnings/Total assets.

Variable.name: investment_asset_ratio
Variable.description: Capital costs/Total assets.

Variable.name: total_income
Variable.description: Total monthly income (revenues, new bank loans, new share issues). Used for the balance sheet accounting.

Variable.name: total_liabilities
Variable.description: Sum of liabilities.

Variable.name: total_expenses
Variable.description: Sum of expenses.

Variable.name: wage_offer
Variable.description: The basic wage offer paid per unit of specific skills

Variable.name: technology
Variable.description: Average technology/productivity of the capital

Variable.name: no_employees
Variable.description: Number of employees

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_1
Variable.description: Number of employees with general skills 1

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_2
Variable.description: Number of employees with general skills 2

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_3
Variable.description: Number of employees with general skills 3

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_4
Variable.description: Number of employees with general skills 4

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_5
Variable.description: Number of employees with general skills 5

Variable.name: vacancies
Variable.description: Number of vacancies

Variable.name: no_redundancies
Variable.description: Number of vacancies

Variable.name: no_redundancies_r_and_d_employees
Variable.description: Number of vacancies

Variable.name: vacancies_r_and_d_employees
Variable.description: Number of vacancies for R and D

Variable.name: posted_vacancies
Variable.description: Number of posted vacancies

Variable.name: posted_vacancies_r_and_d_employees
Variable.description: Number of posted vacancies for R and D

Variable.name: average_g_skill
Variable.description: Average general skills of the workforce

Variable.name: average_adaptation_speed_specific_skills
Variable.description: Average adaptation speed of the work force

Variable.name: average_s_skill_of_1
Variable.description: Average specific skills of employees with general skills 1

Variable.name: average_s_skill_of_2
Variable.description: Average specific skills of employees with general skills 2

Variable.name: average_s_skill_of_3
Variable.description: Average specific skills of employees with general skills 3

Variable.name: average_s_skill_of_4
Variable.description: Average specific skills of employees with general skills 4

Variable.name: average_s_skill_of_5
Variable.description: Average specific skills of employees with general skills 5

Variable.name: wage_offer_for_skill_1
Variable.description: Wage offer for workers with skill level 1

Variable.name: wage_offer_for_skill_2
Variable.description: Wage offer for workers with skill level 2

Variable.name: wage_offer_for_skill_3
Variable.description: Wage offer for workers with skill level 3

Variable.name: wage_offer_for_skill_4
Variable.description: Wage offer for workers with skill level 4

Variable.name: wage_offer_for_skill_5
Variable.description: Wage offer for workers with skill level 5

Variable.name: wage_offer_for_r_and_d_employees
Variable.description: Wage offer for workers with skill level 5

Variable.name: employees_needed
Variable.description: Number of workers a firm needs for next production

Variable.name: age
Variable.description: Age of the firm in months.

Variable.name: transfer_payment
Variable.description: The transfer payment read from message.

Variable.name: subsidy_pct
Variable.description: The subsidy percentage read from message.

Variable.name: active
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm should start production activity.

Variable.name: inactive
Variable.description: 0,1. Opposite of the active flag. Used to filter out all non-bankrupt firms.

Variable.name: zero_output
Variable.description: 0,1. Zero output flag. Used to filter out all firms with zero output.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_idle_counter
Variable.description: Number of iterations before the bankrupt firm becomes active again and resumes production activity.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_insolvency_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy case: insolvency.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_illiquidity_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy case: illiquidity.

Variable.name: financial_crisis_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in a financial crisis state.

Variable.name: average_s_skill_from_eurostat
Variable.description: The regional specific skill (firm average) computed by Eurostat and sent to firms. This variable is used when a firm is re-activated after bankruptcy.

Variable.name: average_output_from_eurostat
Variable.description: The regional firm average output computed by Eurostat and sent to firms. This variable is used when a firm is re-activated after bankruptcy.

Variable.name: subsidy_payment
Variable.description: Amount of subsidy payment received from Government

Variable.name: indicator_earnings
Variable.description: 0,1 indicator for positive net_earnings

Variable.name: indicator_capital_costs
Variable.description: 0,1 indicator for positive capital_costs

Variable.name: indicator_size_by_capital_stock
Variable.description: 0,1 indicator for total_units_capital_stock above economy mean capital stock

Variable.name: market_research_sample_size
Variable.description: Sample size of the questionaire for estimating the price sensitivity.

Variable.name: product_innovation
Variable.description: Indicator variable for product innovation.

Variable.name: regional_analysis
Variable.description: Boolean variable: Market research will be carried out regionally.

Variable.name: market_research_active
Variable.description: Binary variable: 1 market research in this period.

Variable.name: innovation_successful
Variable.description: Binary variable: 1 innvoation was succesful.

Variable.name: actual_market_share
Variable.description: Market share realized on the amrket.

Variable.name: market_size
Variable.description: total quantity of sold items on the market.

Variable.name: estimated_market_size
Variable.description: total quantity of sold items on the market.

Variable.name: market_research_delayed
Variable.description: Flag set to 1 if the required sample size is not reached

Variable.name: estimated_market_share
Variable.description: Estimated market share at the current month, compued as linear combination.

Variable.name: estimated_market_share_beginning_of_year
Variable.description: Market share estimation for the binning of the year.

Variable.name: estimated_market_share_end_of_year
Variable.description: Market share estimation for the end of the year.

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: gov_id
Variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: day_of_month_to_act
Variable.description: Activation day.

Variable.name: payment_account
Variable.description: Current account value.

Variable.name: bank_id
Variable.description: Bank ID at which the agent maintains its payment account.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: consumption_budget
Variable.description: Part of the budget for consumption

Variable.name: consumption_budget_in_month
Variable.description: The budget that is available for consumption during the month

Variable.name: week_of_month
Variable.description: Week counter

Variable.name: weekly_budget
Variable.description: Budget for one week

Variable.name: rationed
Variable.description: Indicator: 1: desired good is sold out; 0: else

Variable.name: mall_completely_sold_out
Variable.description: Indicator: 1: no stocks in the mall, 0: else

Variable.name: day_of_week_to_act
Variable.description: Weekly shopping day

Variable.name: day_of_month_receive_income
Variable.description: The day when the household receives the wage or unemployment benefit

Variable.name: current_productivity_employer
Variable.description: Actual capital productivity of the employer

Variable.name: current_mean_specific_skills_employer
Variable.description: Average specific skills of the workforce of the employer

Variable.name: tax_payment
Variable.description: The total amount of taxes paid by household.

Variable.name: cum_total_dividends
Variable.description: Because dividends are paid daily and taxes monthly, the household has to cumulate dividens

Variable.name: tax_rate_hh_capital
Variable.description: The current tax rates on capital income

Variable.name: tax_rate_hh_labour
Variable.description: The current tax rates on labour income

Variable.name: price_index
Variable.description: The current mean prices Message sent by Eurostat

Variable.name: price_index_base_period
Variable.description: The mean prices of a base period

Variable.name: commuting_costs_price_level_weight
Variable.description: Weight of price level that influences the commuting costs

Variable.name: expenditures
Variable.description: Expenditures

Variable.name: received_dividend
Variable.description: Sum of dividends

Variable.name: received_dividend_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Sum of all dividends in calendar month

Variable.name: received_interest_daily
Variable.description: Received daily interest on bank account.

Variable.name: received_interest_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Sum of all interest on bank account received in calendar month

Variable.name: flag_consumption_shifting
Variable.description: Indicator variable that shows if the consumer has to shift the consumption day due to selling restrictions on the Finacual market.

Variable.name: excess_weekly_budget
Variable.description: Auxiliary variable to be used in stategraph condition, excess_weekly_budget=weekly_budget-payment_account

Variable.name: wealth_income_ratio_actual
Variable.description: The actual wealth/mean_income ratio of the household.

Variable.name: wealth_income_ratio_target
Variable.description: Target value of wealth/mean_income ratio used in the Carrol rule for consumption_budget decision.

Variable.name: risk_free_rate
Variable.description: Interest rate on deposits

Variable.name: wealth
Variable.description: Total wealth: payment account + asset wealth

Variable.name: logit_beta
Variable.description: Intensity of choice parameter for the logit choice model.

Variable.name: wage
Variable.description: The wage a household receives

Variable.name: wage_reservation
Variable.description: Reservation wage: Worker does not accept a wage offer below the reservation wage

Variable.name: general_skill
Variable.description: The general skill level (1-5)

Variable.name: on_the_job_search
Variable.description: Indicator variable: 1 on the job search; 0 no on the job search

Variable.name: search_today
Variable.description: Indicator variable: 1 Household will search for a job in this iteration

Variable.name: last_labour_income
Variable.description: The last labour income received by the worker if the Household is unemployed

Variable.name: specific_skill
Variable.description: The specific skills of a worker

Variable.name: employee_firm_id
Variable.description: The id of the employer

Variable.name: just_employed
Variable.description: Indicator if worker was hired in the actual period.

Variable.name: just_unemployed
Variable.description: Indicator if worker was fired in the actual period.

Variable.name: start_unemployed
Variable.description: Employment status at the beginning of the actual period: unemployed

Variable.name: start_employed
Variable.description: Employment status at the beginning of the actual period: employed

Variable.name: unemployed_duration
Variable.description: Duration of unemployment.

Variable.name: enter_matching
Variable.description: Worker enters matching process.

Variable.name: employer_region_id
Variable.description: The region_id of the employer

Variable.name: employer_igfirm
Variable.description: The region_id of the employer

Variable.name: day_of_month_receive_benefit
Variable.description: The day of the month on whivh the household receives its unemployment benefit. Equal to the day on which it became unemployed. This value will change when the household becomes re-employed again by another (or the same) firm, with the exception in case the new firm has the same activation day as the old firm.

Variable.name: unemployment_payment
Variable.description: Unemployment benefit in case the household is unemployed.

Variable.name: region_wide_mean_wage
Variable.description: Mean wage of the household's region. Used in the computation of unemployment benefits.

Variable.name: mean_net_income
Variable.description: Mean of the last net incomes.

Variable.name: unemployment_benefit_pct
Variable.description: Percentage of last earned wage that is received as unemployment benefit, the net replacement rate.

Variable.name: transfer_payment
Variable.description: Amount of the transfer payment.

Variable.name: subsidy_pct
Variable.description: The subsidy percentage read from message.

Variable.name: total_income
Variable.description: Sum of inflows: wage, unemployment benefits, dividends, interest.

Variable.name: total_expenses
Variable.description: Sum of outflows: taxes, consumption

Variable.name: total_assets
Variable.description: Total assets: payment account

Variable.name: total_liabilities
Variable.description: Total liabilities; none at this point.

Variable.name: subsidy_payment
Variable.description: Received subsidy payment from Government.

Variable.name: region_mean_wage
Variable.description: The mean_wage in the household's region. Used in the computation of the unemployment benefits.

Variable.name: human_capital_policy_flag
Variable.description: Indicator variable: If 1 then hc policy is currently installed

Variable.name: questionnaire_attending_propability
Variable.description: Propability to attend a interview.

Variable.name: willingness_to_attend
Variable.description: Boolean variable: Willingness to attend the questionaire. 1 is yes.

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: gov_id
Variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: total_supply
Variable.description: Total number of goods

Variable.name: export_volume_matrix[900]
Variable.description: Matrix holding data on exports between regions, measured in volume.

Variable.name: export_value_matrix[900]
Variable.description: Matrix holding data on exports between regions, measured in value.

Variable.name: export_previous_value_matrix[900]
Variable.description: Matrix holding data on exports between regions, measured against previous prices.

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: gov_id
Variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: bank_id
Variable.description: Bank ID at which the agent maintains its payment account.

Variable.name: day_of_month_to_act
Variable.description: Activation day.

Variable.name: last_day_of_month_to_act
Variable.description: One day before the activation day.

Variable.name: payment_account
Variable.description: Current account value.

Variable.name: payment_account_balance_sheet
Variable.description: Payment account when calculating balance sheet.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: received_interest_daily
Variable.description: Received daily interest on bank account.

Variable.name: received_interest_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Sum of all interest on bank account received in calendar month

Variable.name: ebit
Variable.description: Earnings-before-interest-and-taxes: total revenue - sales_costs

Variable.name: earnings
Variable.description: Earnings after interest payments (= ebit - interest)

Variable.name: tax_rate_corporate
Variable.description: Tax rate on corporate profits (kept in memory)

Variable.name: tax_rate_vat
Variable.description: VAT tax rate

Variable.name: tax_payment
Variable.description: Tax payment over earnings after interest payments (tax_corporate*earnings)

Variable.name: tax_payment_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Tax payment over earnings after interest payments (tax_corporate*earnings)

Variable.name: net_earnings
Variable.description: Net earnings after tax payments (= ebit - interest - tax)

Variable.name: previous_net_earnings
Variable.description: Net earnings from previous production period

Variable.name: total_dividend_payment
Variable.description: Total dividend payment

Variable.name: total_dividend_payment_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Total dividend payment in calendar month

Variable.name: current_share_price
Variable.description: Current share price on the market

Variable.name: previous_dividend_per_share
Variable.description: Dividend-per-share ratio (previous production cycle)

Variable.name: current_dividend_per_share
Variable.description: Dividend-per-share ratio

Variable.name: previous_earnings_per_share
Variable.description: Earnings-per-Share ratio (previous production cycle)

Variable.name: current_earnings_per_share
Variable.description: Earnings-per-Share ratio

Variable.name: previous_dividend_per_earnings
Variable.description: Dividend-to-Earnings ratio (previous production cycle)

Variable.name: current_dividend_per_earnings
Variable.description: Dividend-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: debt_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Debt-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: debt_equity_ratio
Variable.description: Debt-to-Equity ratio

Variable.name: price_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Price-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: retained_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Retained earnings-to-Earnings ratio

Variable.name: earnings_per_share_ratio_growth
Variable.description: Target growth of the Earnings-per-Share ratio

Variable.name: critical_price_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Critical (target) value for the Price-Earnings ratio (can be set by the firm)

Variable.name: critical_earnings_per_share_ratio
Variable.description: Critical (target) value for the Earnings-per-Share ratio (derived from the growth level)

Variable.name: total_debt
Variable.description: Total value of all loans outstanding

Variable.name: total_debt_balance_sheet
Variable.description: Total value of all loans outstanding

Variable.name: total_assets
Variable.description: Value of total assets

Variable.name: equity
Variable.description: equity = total assets - total liabilities

Variable.name: equity_balance_sheet
Variable.description: equity = total assets - total liabilities

Variable.name: earnings_per_share
Variable.description: Earnings per share ratio

Variable.name: total_payments
Variable.description: Sum of payments: taxes, interest, principle, production costs (labour+capital).

Variable.name: previous_shares_outstanding
Variable.description: Outstanding shares in previous month

Variable.name: total_income
Variable.description: Total monthly income (revenues, new bank loans, new share issues). Used for the balance sheet accounting.

Variable.name: total_liabilities
Variable.description: Sum of liabilities

Variable.name: total_expenses
Variable.description: Sum of expenses

Variable.name: calc_production_costs
Variable.description: Sum of liabilities

Variable.name: productivity
Variable.description: Current productivity of the offered capital good

Variable.name: capital_good_price
Variable.description: Current price of the offered capital good

Variable.name: mean_productivity_of_sales
Variable.description: Averaged productivity of sold capital goods within the last production period.

Variable.name: ratio_sold_productivity_best_practice
Variable.description: Ratio of the Averaged productivity of sold capital goods and the best practice technology.

Variable.name: igfirm_endogenous_innovation_probability
Variable.description: 10. Probability that the investment goods producer innovate a new technology if igfirm is switchoff.

Variable.name: revenue_per_day
Variable.description: Revenue of the current day

Variable.name: net_profit
Variable.description: Earnings minus tax payment

Variable.name: current_shares_outstanding
Variable.description: Number of shares outstanding

Variable.name: energy_price_markup
Variable.description: Mark up on capital goods price.

Variable.name: energy_costs_per_day
Variable.description: The share of the daily capital bill that are energy costs.

Variable.name: earnings_per_day
Variable.description: The collected revenues minus energy costs.

Variable.name: cum_energy_costs
Variable.description: This is to compute the total expenses for energy.

Variable.name: mean_sales_last_months
Variable.description: Mean of sales over the last months.

Variable.name: dividend_payment
Variable.description: Dividend payment of the IGFirm.

Variable.name: duration_until_next_innovation
Variable.description: Period counter after the last innovation.

Variable.name: unit_costs
Variable.description: Costs per unit of output.

Variable.name: sales
Variable.description: Number of units sold.

Variable.name: capital_good_demand
Variable.description: Capital good demand

Variable.name: capital_good_demand_last_month
Variable.description: Capital good demand of the previous month

Variable.name: sales_last_month
Variable.description: Number of units sold in the last n periods.

Variable.name: cum_revenue
Variable.description: Revenue in the actual period.

Variable.name: cum_revenue_last_month
Variable.description: Revenue in the actual period.

Variable.name: mean_general_skills
Variable.description: Average value of general skills

Variable.name: mean_adaptation_speed
Variable.description: Average adaptation speed in the economy

Variable.name: productivity_progress_in_economy
Variable.description: Economy wide productivity progress. Used to compute cost incrreases.

Variable.name: economy_wide_capital_stock
Variable.description: Economy wide productivity progress. Used to compute cost incrreases.

Variable.name: age
Variable.description: Age of the firm in months.

Variable.name: transfer_payment
Variable.description: The transfer payment read from message.

Variable.name: subsidy_pct
Variable.description: The subsidy percentage read from message.

Variable.name: active
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm should start production activity.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_idle_counter
Variable.description: Number of iterations before the bankrupt firm becomes active again and resumes production activity.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_insolvency_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy case: insolvency.

Variable.name: bankruptcy_illiquidity_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy case: illiquidity.

Variable.name: financial_crisis_state
Variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in a financial crisis state.

Variable.name: economy_wide_general_skills_in_firms
Variable.description: Average general skill level economy-wide. Used be the IGFirm to set the productivity for capital vintages.

Variable.name: economy_wide_specific_skills_in_firms
Variable.description: Average specific skill level economy-wide. Used be the IGFirm to set the productivity for capital vintages.

Variable.name: subsidy_payment
Variable.description: Amount of subsidy payment received from Government

Variable.name: wage_offer
Variable.description: Wage offer. Needed for computing the initial unit costs.

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: switch_datastorage
Variable.description: Switch to turn on/off datastorage

Variable.name: num_households
Variable.description: Number of households in the economy

Variable.name: no_households_skill_1
Variable.description: Number of households in the economy with general skill level 1

Variable.name: no_households_skill_2
Variable.description: Number of households in the economy with general skill level 2

Variable.name: no_households_skill_3
Variable.description: Number of households in the economy with general skill level 3

Variable.name: no_households_skill_4
Variable.description: Number of households in the economy with general skill level 4

Variable.name: no_households_skill_5
Variable.description: Number of households in the economy with general skill level 5

Variable.name: employed
Variable.description: Number of employed households

Variable.name: employed_skill_1
Variable.description: Number of employed households with general skill level 1

Variable.name: employed_skill_2
Variable.description: Number of employed households with general skill level 2

Variable.description: Number of employed households with general skill level 3

Variable.name: employed_skill_4
Variable.description: Number of employed households with general skill level 4

Variable.name: employed_skill_5
Variable.description: Number of employed households with general skill level 5

Variable.name: unemployed
Variable.description: Number of unemployed Hoseholds

Variable.name: unemployment_rate
Variable.description: Unemployment rate

Variable.name: employment_rate
Variable.description: Employment rate

Variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_1
Variable.description: Unemployment rate general skill level 1

Variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_2
Variable.description: Unemployment rate general skill level 2

Variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_3
Variable.description: Unemployment rate general skill level 3

Variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_4
Variable.description: Unemployment rate general skill level 4

Variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_5
Variable.description: Unemployment rate general skill level 5

Variable.name: average_wage
Variable.description: Average wage in the economy

Variable.name: average_wage_skill_1
Variable.description: Average wage of households with general skill level 1 in the economy

Variable.name: average_wage_skill_2
Variable.description: Average wage of households with general skill level 2 in the economy

Variable.name: average_wage_skill_3
Variable.description: Average wage of households with general skill level 3 in the economy

Variable.name: average_wage_skill_4
Variable.description: Average wage of households with general skill level 4 in the economy

Variable.name: average_wage_skill_5
Variable.description: Average wage of households with general skill level 5 in the economy

Variable.name: average_s_skill
Variable.description: Average specific skills in the economy

Variable.name: average_s_skill_1
Variable.description: Average specific skills of households with general skill level 1 in the economy

Variable.name: average_s_skill_2
Variable.description: Average specific skills of households with general skill level 1 in the economy

Variable.name: average_s_skill_3
Variable.description: Average specific skills of households with general skill level 1 in the economy

Variable.name: average_s_skill_4
Variable.description: Average specific skills of households with general skill level 1 in the economy

Variable.name: average_s_skill_5
Variable.description: Average specific skills of households with general skill level 1 in the economy

Variable.name: no_firms
Variable.description: Number of firms in the economy

Variable.name: no_active_firms
Variable.description: Number of active firms.

Variable.name: no_vacancies
Variable.description: Number of vacancies in the economy

Variable.name: no_posted_vacancies
Variable.description: Number of posted vacancies in the economy

Variable.name: no_employees
Variable.description: Number of employees in the economy (in firms)

Variable.name: no_employees_production
Variable.description: Number of employees in the economy (in firm's production role)

Variable.name: no_employees_r_and_d
Variable.description: Number of r amd d employees in the economy (in firms)

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_1
Variable.description: Number of employees in the economy with general skill level 1 (in firms)

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_2
Variable.description: Number of employees in the economy with general skill level 2 (in firms)

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_3
Variable.description: Number of employees in the economy with general skill level 3 (in firms)

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_4
Variable.description: Number of employees in the economy with general skill level 4 (in firms)

Variable.name: no_employees_skill_5
Variable.description: Number of employees in the economy with general skill level 5 (in firms)

Variable.name: firm_average_wage
Variable.description: average wage in the economy paid by firms

Variable.name: firm_average_production_wage
Variable.description: average production wage in the economy paid by firms

Variable.name: firm_average_r_and_d_wage
Variable.description: average wage in the economy paid by r and d employees

Variable.name: firm_average_wage_skill_1
Variable.description: Average wage in the economy paid by firms for general skill level 1

Variable.name: firm_average_wage_skill_2
Variable.description: Average wage in the economy paid by firms for general skill level 2

Variable.name: firm_average_wage_skill_3
Variable.description: Average wage in the economy paid by firms for general skill level 3

Variable.name: firm_average_wage_skill_4
Variable.description: Average wage in the economy paid by firms for general skill level 4

Variable.name: firm_average_wage_skill_5
Variable.description: Average wage in the economy paid by firms for general skill level 5

Variable.name: firm_average_g_skill
Variable.description: Average general skills in firms in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_s_skill
Variable.description: Average specific skills in firm in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_s_skill_1
Variable.description: Average specific skills of general skill level 1 in firms in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_s_skill_2
Variable.description: Average specific skills of general skill level 2 in firms in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_s_skill_3
Variable.description: Average specific skills of general skill level 3 in firms in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_s_skill_4
Variable.description: Average specific skills of general skill level 4 in firms in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_s_skill_5
Variable.description: Average specific skills of general skill level 5 in firms in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_quality
Variable.description: Average consumption good quality in the economy

Variable.name: firm_average_price
Variable.description: Average unweighted consumption good price of active firms

Variable.name: total_earnings
Variable.description: Total profits across firms (sum of net_earnings)

Variable.name: total_debt
Variable.description: Total debts across firms (sum of total_debt)

Variable.name: total_assets
Variable.description: Total value of assets across firms

Variable.name: total_equity
Variable.description: Total value of equity across firms

Variable.name: average_debt_earnings_ratio
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: average debt/earnings ratio across firms (total debt divided by total earnings)

Variable.name: average_debt_equity_ratio
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: average debt/equity ratio across firms (total debt divided by total equity)

Variable.name: labour_share_ratio
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: average labour share across firms (defined as total wages divided by total profits)

Variable.name: cpi
Variable.description: Consumer Price Index. Measured as a weighted price index across all firms, all malls, using as weights the firms' market shares.

Variable.name: hpi
Variable.description: Harmonized Price Index. Combines the CPI and the PPI. The investment value (investment goods price "weighted" with quantity, but since there is just one price, this reduces to the total investment value) is added to the weighted consumer prices.

Variable.name: gdp
Variable.description: GDP = Consumption + Investments (measured at firms, sum of cum_revenues + investment_costs)

Variable.name: monthly_investment_value
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: monthly value of investments, aggregating the firms capital costs.

Variable.name: monthly_sold_quantity
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of sold quantity

Variable.name: herfindahl_index
Variable.description: herfindahl index indicating the concentration on the consumption goods market

Variable.name: monthly_output
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of output

Variable.name: monthly_revenue
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of cum_revenue

Variable.name: monthly_planned_output
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of planned output

Variable.name: price_index
Variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: weighted mean prices

Variable.name: no_firm_births
Variable.description: Number of new firms in the economy this month

Variable.name: no_firm_deaths
Variable.description: Number of firm demises in the economy this month

Variable.name: firm_age_distribution[301]
Variable.description: Distribution of firm ages in 300 bins (in months, max age 300 months)

Variable.name: firm_age_distribution_multiperiod[3612]
Variable.description: Distribution of firm ages in 300 bins, 12 rows

Variable.name: firm_age_distribution_1_period_lag[301]
Variable.description: Copy of firm_age_distribution[301], needed for the computation of survival rates.

Variable.name: firm_age_distribution_2_period_lag[301]
Variable.description: Copy of firm_age_distribution[301], needed for the computation of survival rates.

Variable.name: firm_birth_rate
Variable.description: Firm birth rate: Number of new firms in the economy this month, divided by the total number of firms that are active this month.

Variable.name: firm_death_rate
Variable.description: Firm death rate: Number of firm demises in the economy this month, divided by the total number of firms that are active this month.

Variable.name: survival_rate[301]
Variable.description: Firm survival rates in 300 age bins: Definition "The survival rate after 1 year is the percentage of all enterprise births of year n which are still active in year n+1." We only measure the 1-month survival rate: the percentage of firms age 0-59 months that are still active in the next month, thus having age 1-60 months.

Variable.name: survival_rate_multiperiod_1[301]
Variable.description: Multi-period survival rates. Definition: "The survival rate after x years is the percentage of all enterprise births of year n which are still active in year n+x." The 1st row survival_rate_multiperiod[0][.] equals survival_rate[], and contains the 1-period survival rates (for all age bins 0-59). The 2nd row survival_rate_multiperiod[1][.] contains the 2-period survival rates (for all age bins 0-59), etc.

Variable.name: survival_rate_multiperiod_2[301]
Variable.description: Multi-period survival rates. Definition: "The survival rate after x years is the percentage of all enterprise births of year n which are still active in year n+x." The 1st row survival_rate_multiperiod[0][.] equals survival_rate[], and contains the 1-period survival rates (for all age bins 0-59). The 2nd row survival_rate_multiperiod[1][.] contains the 2-period survival rates (for all age bins 0-59), etc.

Variable.name: survival_rate_multiperiod[3612]
Variable.description: Multi-period survival rates. Definition: "The survival rate after x years is the percentage of all enterprise births of year n which are still active in year n+x." The 1st row survival_rate_multiperiod[0][.] equals survival_rate[], and contains the 1-period survival rates (for all age bins 0-59). The 2nd row survival_rate_multiperiod contains all survival rates (for periods 1...12, for all age bins 0-59), etc.

Variable.name: recession_started
Variable.description: Indicator signalling the start of a recession. 0: no recession, 1: recession.

Variable.name: recession_duration
Variable.description: Duration of a recession measured in quarters.

Variable.name: export_volume_matrix[100]
Variable.description: Matrix holding data on exports between regions, measured in volume.

Variable.name: export_value_matrix[100]
Variable.description: Matrix holding data on exports between regions, measured in value.

Variable.name: export_previous_value_matrix[100]
Variable.description: Matrix holding data on exports between regions, measured against previous prices.

Variable.name: region_export_volume[100]
Variable.description: Array holding data on total exports of each region, measured in volume.

Variable.name: region_import_volume[100]
Variable.description: Array holding data on total imports of each region, measured in volume.

Variable.name: region_export_value[100]
Variable.description: Array holding data on total exports of each region, measured in value.

Variable.name: region_import_value[100]
Variable.description: Array holding data on total imports of each region, measured in value.

Variable.name: region_import_previous_value[100]
Variable.description: Array holding data on total imports of each region, measured in value against previous prices.

Variable.name: firm_average_productivity_progress
Variable.description: Average productivity progress of the firms in the last month.

Variable.name: firm_average_productivity
Variable.description: Average productivty of the firms in the last month.

Variable.name: investment_gdp_ratio
Variable.description: Ratio of investment/gdp.

Variable.name: total_capital_stock_units
Variable.description: Economy wide total capital stock in units.

Variable.name: total_value_mall_inventories
Variable.description: Value of goods stored in malls.

Variable.name: total_dividends
Variable.description: Sum of dividends paid by firms and IG firms.

Variable.name: base_wage_offer
Variable.description: Mean base wage offer reported by firms

Variable.name: just_employed
Variable.description: Sum of new hirings.

Variable.name: just_unemployed
Variable.description: Sum of new firings.

Variable.name: start_employed
Variable.description: Employed at the beginning of the actual month.

Variable.name: start_unemployed
Variable.description: Unemployed at the beginning of the actual month.

Variable.name: enter_matching
Variable.description: Sum of workers entering the matching process.

Variable.name: job_seperation_rate
Variable.description: just_unemployed/start_employed

Variable.name: job_finding_rate
Variable.description: just_employed/enter_matching

Variable.name: v_u_ratio
Variable.description: no_vacancies/unemployed

Variable.name: matching_rate
Variable.description: just_employed/no_posted_Vacancies

Variable.name: hh_payment_account
Variable.description: Sum of households payment accounts

Variable.name: mean_net_income
Variable.description: Economy-wide mean net income of households.

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: gov_id
Variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: active
Variable.description: Indicator of Bank activity. Active=1: equity GT 0.

Variable.name: inactive
Variable.description: Indicator of Bank inactivity. Active=0: InActive=1.

Variable.name: cash
Variable.description: Bank's cash reserves.

Variable.name: total_credit
Variable.description: Sum of outstanding loans, total credit.

Variable.name: equity
Variable.description: Total assets minus total liabilities.

Variable.name: ecb_debt
Variable.description: Total liquidity borrowed from Central Bank.

Variable.name: value_at_risk
Variable.description: Total value at risk of the bank's loan portfolio.

Variable.name: deposit_interest_rate
Variable.description: Rate on deposits/payment accounts.

Variable.name: bank_gamma[2]
Variable.description: Behavioural parameter used to set the loan interest rates for firms.

Variable.name: profits[2]
Variable.description: Current and previous period's profits.

Variable.name: bank_dividend_rate
Variable.description: Percentage of bank's profits paid out as dividends. Default 100%.

Variable.name: tax_rate_corporate
Variable.description: Government tax rate on corporate profits.

Variable.name: current_shares_outstanding
Variable.description: Number of oustanding shares.

Variable.name: debt_period
Variable.description: Length of the debt repayment period. Equaly the global model constant.

Variable.name: loan_request_message_found
Variable.description: Indicator.

Variable.name: day_of_month_to_act
Variable.description: Day of the month to act for bank accounting function.

Variable.name: deposits
Variable.description: Total end-of-the-day deposits.

Variable.name: firm_loan_installments
Variable.description: Installment amount received by firms.

Variable.name: firm_loan_installments_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Installment amount received by firms.

Variable.name: firm_interest_payments
Variable.description: Interests paid by firms.

Variable.name: firm_interest_payments_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Interests paid by firms in calendar month.

Variable.name: firm_loan_issues
Variable.description: Total amount of credit provided to firms this month.

Variable.name: ecb_interest_payment
Variable.description: Interest the bank pays to Central Bank on its ECB debt (standing facility).

Variable.name: total_dividend_payment
Variable.description: Dividend payment of the bank.

Variable.name: total_dividends_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Dividend payment of the bank in the calendar month

Variable.name: taxes
Variable.description: Tax payment of the bank.

Variable.name: dividend_per_share
Variable.description: Dividends earned by one share.

Variable.name: current_share_price
Variable.description: Market price of bank's shares.

Variable.name: leverage_ratio
Variable.description: The leverage ratio of the bank, defined as total credit / total deposits.

Variable.name: cash_deposit_ratio
Variable.description: The cash reserve ratio: cash / total deposits.

Variable.name: equity_asset_ratio
Variable.description: Bank equity / assets. Measure for bank risk.

Variable.name: mean_interest_rate
Variable.description: The overall mean interest rate of the bank (monthly). Defined as: sum of interest rates for new loans this month / number of new loans this month.

Variable.name: sum_new_interest_rates_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Sum of interest rates for new loans this month.

Variable.name: no_new_loans_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Number of new loans this month.

Variable.name: paid_interest_daily
Variable.description: Paid daily interest on bank accounts.

Variable.name: paid_interest_in_calendar_month
Variable.description: Sum of all interest paid on bank accounts in calendar month

Variable.name: excess_var
Variable.description: Excess of the value at risk: Difference of the maximum value at risk to the current VaR.

Variable.name: excess_liquidity
Variable.description: Excess of the bank liquidity: Difference of the minimum liquidity requirement and the current liquidity of the bank.

Variable.name: total_bad_debt_calendar_month
Variable.description: Sum of bad_debt of the bank.

Variable.name: total_income
Variable.description: Sum of inflows

Variable.name: total_expenses
Variable.description: Sum of outflows

Variable.name: total_assets
Variable.description: Sum of assets

Variable.name: total_liabilities
Variable.description: Sum of liabilities

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: payment_account
Variable.description: Current account value.

Variable.name: day_of_month_to_act
Variable.description: Activation day.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: unemployment_benefit_pct
Variable.description: Variable that sets the unemployment benefit as a fraction of last labour income.

Variable.name: gdp_fraction_consumption
Variable.description: Parameter that sets the government consumption expenditure as a fraction of GDP.

Variable.name: gdp_fraction_investment
Variable.description: Parameter that sets the government investment expenditure as a fraction of GDP.

Variable.name: tax_rate_corporate
Variable.description: Corporate tax rate on firm and bank profits.

Variable.name: tax_rate_hh_labour
Variable.description: Labour income tax rate for households.

Variable.name: tax_rate_hh_capital
Variable.description: Capital gains tax rate for households.

Variable.name: tax_rate_vat
Variable.description: VAT tax.

Variable.name: monthly_tax_revenues
Variable.description: Monthly tax revenues.

Variable.name: yearly_tax_revenues
Variable.description: Yearly tax revenues.

Variable.name: monthly_benefit_payment
Variable.description: Unemployment benefit payments to all unemployed households.

Variable.name: yearly_benefit_payment
Variable.description: Unemployment benefit payments for all unemployed households.

Variable.name: hh_transfer_payment
Variable.description: Household transfer payment amount.

Variable.name: firm_transfer_payment
Variable.description: Firm transfer payment amount.

Variable.name: monthly_transfer_payment
Variable.description: Aggregate monthly transfer payments.

Variable.name: yearly_transfer_payment
Variable.description: Aggregate yearly transfer payments.

Variable.name: hh_subsidy_pct
Variable.description: The household subsidy percentage on the price of consumer goods.

Variable.name: firm_subsidy_pct
Variable.description: The firm subsidy percentage on the price of capital goods.

Variable.name: regional_firm_subsidy
Variable.description: Flag: If 1 then this government pays subsidies

Variable.name: subsidy_flag
Variable.description: Indicator to indicate if stabilization subsidy is active. 1 means active, 0 means inactive.

Variable.name: gov_interest_rate
Variable.description: Interest rate the government uses to pay interest on the public debt.

Variable.name: monthly_bond_interest_payment
Variable.description: Aggregate monthly bond interest payments.

Variable.name: monthly_subsidy_payment
Variable.description: Aggregate monthly subsidy payments.

Variable.name: monthly_consumption_expenditure
Variable.description: The actual monthly government consumption expenditure that is realised at the end of the month.

Variable.name: monthly_investment_expenditure
Variable.description: The actual monthly government investment expenditure that is realised at the end of the month.

Variable.name: monthly_budget_balance
Variable.description: The budget balance (deficit/surplus) that is realised at the end of the month.

Variable.name: monthly_gdp
Variable.description: This is monthly GDP, summed over the regions belonging to this government.

Variable.name: monthly_budget_balance_gdp_fraction
Variable.description: The monthly budget balance as a percentage of monthly gdp.

Variable.name: monthly_consumption_budget
Variable.description: The consumption budget for the next month.

Variable.name: monthly_investment_budget
Variable.description: The investment budget for the next month.

Variable.name: monthly_income
Variable.description: The actual total government income at end of month.

Variable.name: monthly_expenditure
Variable.description: The actual total government expenditure at end of month.

Variable.name: yearly_subsidy_payment
Variable.description: Aggregate yearly subsidy payments.

Variable.name: yearly_bond_interest_payment
Variable.description: Aggregate yearly bond interest payments.

Variable.name: yearly_investment_expenditure
Variable.description: The actual yearly government investment expenditure that is realised at the end of the year.

Variable.name: yearly_consumption_expenditure
Variable.description: The actual yearly government consumption expenditure that is realised at the end of the year.

Variable.name: yearly_income
Variable.description: The actual total government income received at the end of the year.

Variable.name: yearly_expenditure
Variable.description: The actual total government expenditure at the end of the year.

Variable.name: total_debt
Variable.description: Government debt.

Variable.name: yearly_budget_balance
Variable.description: The budget balance (deficit/surplus) that is realised at the end of the year.

Variable.name: total_money_financing
Variable.description: The fraction of the budget deficit that is financed by money creation.

Variable.name: total_bond_financing
Variable.description: The fraction of the budget deficit that is financed by government bonds.

Variable.name: country_wide_mean_wage
Variable.description: Country wide mean wage is the mean wage for all regions associated to this government.

Variable.name: num_unemployed
Variable.description: The number of unemployed that are associated to the government.

Variable.name: yearly_gdp
Variable.description: This is yearly GDP, summed over the regions belonging to this government.

Variable.name: previous_year_gdp
Variable.description: This is GDP of the previous year, for this government.

Variable.name: gdp_growth
Variable.description: GDP growth rate (updated once a year).

Variable.name: gdp_forecast
Variable.description: Forecast for next year's GDP.

Variable.name: yearly_income_forecast
Variable.description: Forecasted/planned total government income for the next year.

Variable.name: yearly_expenditure_budget
Variable.description: The total expenditure budget for the next year.

Variable.name: budget_balance_forecast
Variable.description: Forcast for the budget balance (deficit/surplus).

Variable.name: yearly_consumption_budget
Variable.description: The planned consumption budget for the next year.

Variable.name: yearly_investment_budget
Variable.description: The planned investment budget for the next year.

Variable.name: yearly_budget_balance_gdp_fraction
Variable.description: The yearly budget balance as a percentage of yearly gdp.

Variable.name: total_assets
Variable.description: Sum of assets

Variable.name: total_liabilities
Variable.description: Sum of liabilities

Variable.name: cumulated_deficit
Variable.description: The cumulative sum of deficits, updated monthly.

Variable.name: inflation_rate
Variable.description: This is the economy-wide inflation_rate.

Variable.name: unemployment_rate
Variable.description: This is the economy-wide unemployment_rate.

Variable.name: human_capital_policy_installation_date_in_years
Variable.description: Number of iteration when the human capital policy will be installed.

Variable.name: human_capital_policy_flag
Variable.description: Indicator variable.

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: equity
Variable.description: The ECB equity is the account to collect the interest payments from the banks and the government bond coupons.

Variable.name: dividend_payment
Variable.description: The equity of ECB is paid out to all governments as dividends.

Variable.name: fiat_money
Variable.description: Total fiat money.

Variable.name: fiat_money_banks
Variable.description: Sum of all banks ECB debt, here stated as a CB liability on the ECB's balance sheet.

Variable.name: ecb_deposits
Variable.description: Total sum of deposits by governments and banks at the ECB.

Variable.name: cash
Variable.description: CB liquid asset (high-powered money). Is updated with interest payments to and from banks and (possibly) from governments.

Variable.name: bond_holdings_value
Variable.description: Total monetary amount of the ECBs government bond holdings.

Variable.name: nr_gov_bonds
Variable.description: Bond holdings of the Central Bank.

Variable.name: fiat_money_govs
Variable.description: Monetization of government debt.

Variable.name: fiat_money_bond_govs
Variable.description: Quantitative easing: money created to buy government bonds.

Variable.name: bank_interest
Variable.description: Net interest payments received from banks (interest recieved on ECB debts - interest paid on overnight deposits).

Variable.name: gov_interest
Variable.description: Bond coupon payments received on bond holdings.

Variable.name: gov_bond_purchase
Variable.description: Amount of bond purchases.

Variable.name: total_income
Variable.description: Sum of inflows

Variable.name: total_expenses
Variable.description: Sum of outflows

Variable.name: total_assets
Variable.description: Sum of assets

Variable.name: total_liabilities
Variable.description: Sum of liabilities

Variable.name: id
Variable.description: Agent ID.

Variable.name: region_id
Variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

Variable.name: partition_id
Variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

Variable.name: dsratio
Variable.description: Ratio (D/S) of aggregate demand and supply (integers).

Variable.name: monthly_counter_total_dividend
Variable.description: Monthly counter of the total_dividend by firms. Used to compute the dividend per index share.

Variable.name: stock_index_price
Variable.description: Price of the stock index from ADT.
